listings.title: 1 Bed Studio with KLCC View/Rooftop Pool - Netflix

details.description: Close to Kuala Lumpur heartbeat and the majestic KLCC Petronas Twin Tower, Shopping Paradise of Bukit Bintang and food and entertainment outlets in the Golden Triangle. All rooms are overlooking the majestic KLCC Twin Towers and the Titiwangsa lake. We offer hot water shower, AC and a well furnished clean room. The infinity pool overlooking the stunning view of KLCC and KL Tower and Kuala Lumpur panoramic view. As a safety percaution, all areas in the room are pre-disinfected before checking in.The spaceA amazing suite with a view, enjoy a full panoramic view of the KLCC Twin Towers and the KL skyline. Day or Night. Stylish decorated with a small private seated area to enjoy a good cup of coffee or tea.Guest accessThere are 2 Infinity pools here, located on Level 48 and Level 8.Level 48 is the rooftop infinity pool and gym. There's a small entry fees of USD 4 per person for the pool and gym usage. Children under 12 years old are not allowed. Proper swimwear is needed.Level 8 is the Garden view infinity pool and kids pool The pool entry fee is free of charge.Both Level 48 infinity pool, Gym and Level 8 infinity pool opening hours are 8am till 10pm.Other things to noteAncient Sights.1) KLCC Twin Tower - 3km2) Subway - 200m3) Bukit Bintang Pavillion & Lot 10, Berjaya Times Square - 4km4) Jalan Alor Night Market - 4km5) Changkat Bukit Bintang restaurants and night bars - 4km6) Dataran Merdeka (Independence Square) - 4km7) Sultan Abdul Samad Building - 4 km8) China Town - 5 km9) Central Market - 5km10) KL Tower - 4 km11) Botanical Garden - 5 km12) Bird Park - 5km13) Black Wind Cave - 8 km14) Thean Hou Temple - 15 km15) Terminal Building Bus Station - 20 km15) Putrajaya - 30 km16) Genting Highlands and outlet mall - 35km17) KLIA 1 and KLIA 2 Airport - 60km

listings.title: Hanshe 3*112, new, 2 min to sta. Skytree & Asakusa

details.description: Welcome to Hanshe Hotel! Our team has been operating the Hanshe brand since 2016, dedicated to creating high-value accommodations.
